translation.en: ♪ Everybody, come on in It's time to make a scene ♪
translation.fr: Il est temps d'entrer en scène De se lancer sur la piste

translation.en: -♪ Let's get in costume, write a song ♪ -Hello! -♪ And everything in between ♪ -[laughs]
translation.fr: Un monde de costumes, de chansons De machinistes et d'artistes

translation.en: -♪ 'Cause many parts make up the arts ♪ -Whoo-hoo-hoo! Yeah! -♪ Each brings joy to all our hearts ♪ -[chuckles]
translation.fr: Tant de métiers sont associés Pour nous donner de la joie

translation.en: -♪ Circus tricks and improv, too ♪ -Hmm!
♪ Mash 'em up for me and you And dance! ♪
translation.fr: Dès le lever de rideau On danse !

translation.en: ♪ Everybody, we can sing ♪
♪ We can tell a story ♪
♪ Put it all together We can do anything ♪
translation.fr: Si tout le monde s’y met Rien ne peut nous arrêter

translation.en: Hey, Jools.
-Oh, good morning, Gus. -[Toby panting]
Isn't it a glorious day?
That it is.
-Hey, Toby. -[barks]
Everything's ready. I mopped, put the house lights on,
translation.fr: Tout est prêt. J'ai lavé le sol, allumé l'auditorium

translation.en: and glow-taped the stage and steps.
translation.fr: et marqué la scène et les marches.

translation.en: Oh, bless you. [blows kiss]
Still in tune. That's a nice surprise.
I also whipped up some fresh muffins with your dad's recipe.
translation.fr: J'ai aussi préparé des muffins selon la recette de votre père.

translation.en: You're an angel.
-I know. -[chuckles]
[sighs] The first day of a new Greenroom Workshop.
translation.fr: Première journée d'une nouvelle sessions de cours de théâtre.

translation.en: It's always such fun.
Are you as pleased as I am with the lineup of our young performers?
translation.fr: Es-tu aussi enthousiasmé que moi par nos petits artistes ?

translation.en: -Totally. -The Wizard of Oz...
is the perfect show for this group.
translation.fr: est le parfait spectacle pour ce groupe.

translation.en: Look at this mop of hair. Does it not scream Scarecrow?
translation.fr: Regarde cette tignasse. N'est-elle pas faite pour l'Épouvantail ?

translation.en: -Straight out of central casting. -Oh, I know.
translation.fr: - C'est le casting idéal. - Je sais.

translation.en: Toby, you are going to love these kids.
translation.fr: Toby, tu vas adorer ces enfants.

translation.en: -As they are going to love you, of course. -[whimpering]
translation.fr: Et les enfants t'adoreront, bien sûr.

translation.en: Because they always do. [chuckles]
-[door opening] -[sing-song] Hello, Miss Julie!
-Oh! -Hi! Remember me?
I'm Peri! I'm so excited to be here! Wow! I can't believe it!
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Peri ! Je suis si contente d'être ici ! Je n'en reviens pas !

translation.en: [sing-song] I'm here! I'm actually here!
-Well, hello, Peri. -Hi.
[chuckles] Hi. Hi.
Hey, I'm Gus. That's Toby. He's very friendly.
translation.fr: Salut, moi c'est Gus. Voici Toby. Il est très gentil.

translation.en: Oh, hi, Gus.
Hi, Toby. Hi.
Oh, Miss Julie, I have been begging my mom
translation.fr: Ça fait une éternité que je supplie ma maman

translation.en: to let me join the Greenroom Workshop since forever!
translation.fr: de me laisser participer à votre atelier de théâtre.

translation.en: And it's even dreamier than I imagined.
translation.fr: C'est encore mieux que ce que j'imaginais.

translation.en: -Well, we're delighted to have you! -Wow!
[gasps] You have a poster from Wicked?
translation.fr: Vous avez une affiche de Wicked ?

translation.en: I saw it three times.
Am I in the right place?
Oh, yes, yes! Come in, come in.
-[Toby barks] -Oh. Hola, puppy! [laughs]
That's Toby. He's very friendly.
translation.fr: C'est Toby. Il est très gentil.

translation.en: my name is Penelope Guadalupe Fitzgerald Sanchez,
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Penelope Guadalupe Fitzgerald Sanchez,

translation.en: but everyone calls me Fizz.
translation.fr: mais tout le monde m'appelle Fizz.

translation.en: -Welcome to the greenroom, Fizz. -[Fizz giggles]
-Ooh! -It's my first day.
I know. It's everyone's first day.
translation.fr: Je sais. C'est notre premier jour à tous.

translation.en: Oh. [gasps] Wanna see my bandage?
What happened?
Oh, nothing! Um, I just like bandages.
translation.fr: Rien ! C'est juste que j'aime les pansements.

translation.en: Mmm-hmm, I've got one there and one there and one there.
translation.fr: J'en ai un ici, un là et un autre là.

translation.en: -Oh, I see. Very impressive. -[chuckles]
-Hey, everyone. -Hi.
Uh, Hank and Spike, right?
-[Spike] Mmm-hmm. -Hey, guys. Welcome.
-[both laughing] -Hey, doggie.
[Fizz] That's Toby.
-Hi. -He's really friendly.
Hi, I'm Peri.
I've been acting, singing and dancing since I was born.
translation.fr: Je joue, je chante et je danse depuis la naissance.

translation.en: Hi, I'm Hank. World's number one baseball fan.
translation.fr: Je suis Hank. Le plus grand fan de base-ball au monde.

translation.en: -And I'm Spike. Words are what I like. -Ooh, that rhymes!
translation.fr: Spike est mon nom. Les mots, c'est ma passion. Ça rime !

translation.en: -Yeah. Rhyming's kind of my thing. -[gasps]
translation.fr: Oui. Les rimes, c'est ce qui m'anime.

translation.en: Cool! Some keys!
Piano's kind of my thing.
translation.fr: Ce qui m'anime, c'est le piano.

translation.en: [Spike] Wow, nice!
Whoa, we have a virtuoso in our midst.
translation.fr: Nous sommes en présence d'un virtuose.

translation.en: I'll say. Quite an expert piano player.
Thank you.
Virtuoso means expert.
I'm gonna put that in my word bank.
translation.fr: Je le note dans ma banque de mots.

translation.en: I collect words in this book. -[all] Oh. -[Gus] Cool.
translation.fr: Je note des mots dans ce carnet.

translation.en: Is this the robotics class?
translation.fr: C'est ici, le cours de robotique ?

translation.en: No, this is the Greenroom Performing Arts Workshop.
translation.fr: Non, c'est l'atelier des arts du spectacle.

translation.en: -You must be Riley. -[Riley] Hi.
How did I get here?
Well, your mom and dad thought you'd enjoy it.
translation.fr: Tes parents ont pensé que ça te plairait.

translation.en: I'm Miss Julie.
Everybody, this is Riley.
-[Peri and Spike] Hi, Riley. -[Fizz] Hola!
-Hi. Hi. -Hi, Riley, I'm... I'm Gus.
Oh, nice tool belt. [chuckles]
Thanks. It's got all the stage manager essentials.
translation.fr: Merci. J'ai tout ce qu'il faut à un régisseur.

translation.en: Oh, you've got vernier calipers.
translation.fr: Tu as un pied à coulisse.

translation.en: [stutters] And is that a folding ruler?
translation.fr: Et ça, c'est un mètre pliant ?

translation.en: -[chuckles] Yes, it is. -Huh.
Gus is my very able assistant, Riley.
translation.fr: Gus est mon assistant, il est très doué.

translation.en: He started here as a student, just like all of you are today.
translation.fr: Il a commencé ici en tant qu'étudiant, tout comme vous.

translation.en: Yes, I'm a Greenie graduate. At your service.
translation.fr: J'ai été un petit artiste moi aussi. À votre service.

translation.en: [Peri] Oh, that is cool!
Now that we're all here, we're going to get name tags
translation.fr: Maintenant qu'on est tous là, on va écrire notre nom sur une étiquette

translation.en: and then we're going to take a tour of the theater.
[Peri] Oh, I can't wait!
-[Spike] Nice. -[Riley] Never been in a theater before.
translation.fr: Je ne suis jamais allé dans un théâtre.

translation.en: [Julie] Thank you. Here we go.
I like my name tag. It reminds me of my bandages.
translation.fr: J'aime mon étiquette. Elle me rappelle mes pansements.

translation.en: Fizz, darling. [chuckles] Not there.
No, I think it would look better right there.
translation.fr: Je pense qu'elle irait mieux ici.

translation.en: -[Fizz] Oh. -Now, before we go out onstage,
you should know that we call this room the greenroom.
translation.fr: il faut que vous sachiez que cette pièce est l'atelier.

translation.en: -[gasps] 'Cause it's green. -[Julie] Ours is, yes,
translation.fr: - Parce qu'on y travaille ? - En effet,

translation.en: but they're... they're not always green.
translation.fr: mais ça ne sert pas qu'à ça.

translation.en: The greenroom is where we meet, we eat, we rest,
translation.fr: C'est ici qu'on se réunit, qu'on mange, qu'on se repose,

translation.en: we learn our lines and...
we talk about how to make our show the best it can possibly be.
translation.fr: et qu'on discute pour rendre le spectacle aussi parfait que possible.

translation.en: -And there's one in every theater. -Mmm-hmm. Down there are the dressing rooms,
translation.fr: Tous les théâtres en ont un. Par là, il y a les loges,

translation.en: -where we put on our costumes and makeup. -[Julie] Now...
translation.fr: - où on met costume et maquillage. - Et maintenant,

translation.en: follow me, everybody. To the stage!
[all] To the stage!
-Oh. Cool chair, Hank. -Oh, thanks!
Do you have to stay in it all the time?
translation.fr: Tu dois rester dedans tout le temps ?

translation.en: Yep. I was born this way. But I'm used to it.
translation.fr: Oui. Je suis né comme ça. Mais j'ai l'habitude.

translation.en: And I can do a bunch of cool stuff. Check this out.
translation.fr: Et je peux faire des trucs cool. Regardez.

translation.en: And here is the theater.
Isn't it beautiful?
-[all] Oh, yeah. -[Gus] It is.
So, this is the stage
where we'll be putting on our show, The Wizard of Oz.
translation.fr: où nous jouerons notre spectacle, Le Magicien d'Oz.

translation.en: [gasps] Wow! The Wizard of Oz! My favorite!
translation.fr: Le Magicien d'Oz ! Ma pièce préférée !

translation.en: Now, the side areas, stage left and stage right,
translation.fr: Sur les deux côtés de la scène, côté cour et côté jardin,

translation.en: those are called the wings.
translation.fr: il y a ce qu'on appelle les coulisses.

translation.en: Do they fly?
-Not exactly, Fizz. -[Fizz] Aw.
But up there is called the flies.
translation.fr: Et là-haut, il y a ce qu'on appelle les cintres.

translation.en: -[Spike] Wow. -Because most of our scenery is up there and it flies in and out.
translation.fr: Parce que le décor y est accroché comme sur des cintres.

translation.en: Is our Yellow Brick Road flying up there?
translation.fr: La route de brique jaune est accrochée là-haut ?

translation.en: It will be, but now it's down in the basement,
translation.fr: Pas encore, elle est au sous-sol,

translation.en: where we store the props and costumes and the rest of the scenery.
translation.fr: avec les accessoires, les costumes et le décor.

translation.en: Oh, Miss Julie, please can I play Dorothy?
translation.fr: Miss Julie, je peux jouer Dorothy, s'il vous plaît ?

translation.en: I just gotta wear those ruby slippers!
translation.fr: Je veux porter ses souliers de rubis !

translation.en: Ooh, and I wanna be the Lion.
translation.fr: Et je veux jouer le Lion.

translation.en: Hank, he's supposed to be cowardly.
translation.fr: Hank, il est censé être peureux.

translation.en: -Oh, right. [meows] -Mmm-hmm.
Does everyone have to play a part?
I don't mind just watching.
Well, everybody contributes something, Riley.
translation.fr: Tout le monde a un rôle à jouer, Riley.

translation.en: For instance, I contribute backstage, making all the tech stuff go smoothly.
translation.fr: Par exemple, mon rôle est en coulisse, à m'occuper de l'aspect technique.

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, I like tech stuff.
There's plenty of tech in the theater, so maybe you can give me a hand.
translation.fr: Il y a de quoi faire, tu pourras m'aider.

translation.en: -Copy that! -[Julie] Oh, oh.
Gus, darling, will you strike the ghost light?
translation.fr: Gus, tu peux éteindre la lumière fantôme ?

translation.en: -[Peri] Ghost light? -[Riley] Ghost? -[Fizz screaming] -[Peri] Where?
-I don't like ghosts! -Don't panic.
translation.fr: - J'ai peur des fantômes ! - Du calme.

translation.en: It is just a theater term for a very special light.
translation.fr: J'aurais dû dire "la sentinelle", le terme correct pour cette lampe.

translation.en: We put the ghost light out at the end of the day
to make sure there's a little bit of light on stage for safety.
translation.fr: pour éclairer la scène, par sécurité.

translation.en: -[all sigh] -[Riley] Oh. Safety first.
Now, come on. Come with me.
Out here, where the audience sits, is called the house.
translation.fr: L'endroit où le public s'assied s'appelle la salle.

translation.en: Wow. It has a lot more chairs than at my house.
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup plus de chaises que chez moi.

translation.en: Did you know Miss Julie's dad built this theater a long, long time ago?
translation.fr: Le père de Miss Julie a construit ce théâtre il y a très longtemps.

translation.en: -[all] Wow. -[Julie] He did. He loved this place.
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Il adorait cet endroit.

translation.en: Look at all the cool lights.
And they all turn different colors, too.
translation.fr: Elles peuvent toutes changer de couleurs.

translation.en: -Can I show them? -Yes, go on.
[Peri] We'd love to see them. -[all clamoring] -Ready.
Now, theater lighting can make the stage look like, um, sunset.
translation.fr: Prêt. L'éclairage peut donner à la scène l'apparence d'un coucher de soleil.

translation.en: -[Julie chuckles] Or... or... -[Fizz] Wow!
I know. Or it can make it look like a wonderful starry night.
translation.fr: Je sais. Ou d'une belle nuit étoilée.

translation.en: -[all gasp] -[Spike] Oh, look at the stars. It looks like my bed time.
translation.fr: - Regardez les étoiles. - On dirait l'heure de faire dodo.

translation.en: Yes. Or it could look like a big storm is coming.
translation.fr: Oui. Ou bien ça peut ressembler à l'approche d'un énorme orage.

translation.en: -Like the tornado in The Wizard of Oz. -Absolutely.
translation.fr: - Comme la tornade dans Le Magicien d'Oz. - Absolument.

translation.en: -That is awesome! -[Julie laughing]
Okay, everybody, let me tell you a little bit about
how our time together here will work.
We're not just putting on a show.
translation.fr: On ne va pas seulement faire un spectacle.

translation.en: We're also going to be learning about the magic of the performing arts.
translation.fr: On va aussi apprendre la magie des arts du spectacle.

translation.en: I mean, dancing and singing and acting.
translation.fr: La danse, le chant, le théâtre.

translation.en: Miss Julie, what's the magic part?
translation.fr: Miss Julie, qu'est-ce qui est magique ?

translation.en: -Shall we tell them, Gus? -[Gus] Absolutely.
♪ Anything can happen in the theater ♪
translation.fr: Au théâtre, c’est vrai, tout peut arriver

translation.en: ♪ Anything can happen on the stage ♪
translation.fr: Tout peut arriver, une fois sur scène

translation.en: ♪ What a sweet, amazing gift Making people's spirits lift ♪
translation.fr: Un cadeau éblouissant Qui élève l’âme des gens

translation.en: ♪ As you bring to life The words on every page ♪
translation.fr: Sous leurs yeux, soudain Le texte prend forme humaine

translation.en: ♪ Anything can happen in the theater ♪
translation.fr: Au théâtre, c’est vrai, tout peut arriver

translation.en: ♪ Looking for adventure You will find it ♪
♪ If you're captured by the magic Of the curtain rising up ♪
translation.fr: Si vous êtes pris par la magie Du grand rideau qui se lève

translation.en: ♪ Just imagine all the magic That's behind it ♪
♪ Costumes needing sewing ♪
♪ Lights to set a-glowing ♪
♪ Stretches, scales ♪
♪ And warm-ups to be led ♪
♪ One, two, three ♪
♪ Have a line change or 11 ♪
translation.fr: Changer une phrase ou même vingt

translation.en: ♪ All the chaos ♪
♪ Ah, simply heaven ♪
♪ Here comes new song number seven ♪
♪ Cue the trumpet here instead ♪
♪ Anything can happen in the theater ♪
translation.fr: Au théâtre, c’est vrai, tout peut arriver

translation.en: ♪ Why wait another moment? Take a seat ♪
translation.fr: Vous allez assister à un miracle

translation.en: ♪ For here's the secret something Every theater artist knows ♪
translation.fr: Voici un grand secret Que les artistes connaissent tous

translation.en: ♪ It's the audience That makes the show complete ♪
translation.fr: Sans le public Il n’y a pas de spectacle

translation.en: ♪ Plus the jokes that make us laugh ♪
♪ And the dancers taking wing And the nice box office staff ♪
translation.fr: Les danseurs déploient leurs ailes On saura vous accueillir

translation.en: ♪ Plus the high notes people sing ♪
translation.fr: Des notes aigües à la pelle…

translation.en: Whoa, nice.
translation.fr: Des notes aigües à la pelle… Joli.

translation.en: ♪ Though with surprise you may react It's a sweet and simple fact ♪
translation.fr: Bien que vous puissiez être surpris C’est un fait bien établi

translation.en: [both] ♪ That anything can happen ♪
[all] ♪ In the theater ♪
What was that?
I don't know. But it sounded like it came from the basement. I'm on it.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Ça avait l'air de venir du sous-sol. Je vais voir.

translation.en: [Julie] What...
Well, um, tell you what,
why don't we get started with our warm-up, huh?
Warm up? But it's not cold in here.
translation.fr: L'échauffement ? Mais il ne fait pas froid.

translation.en: [chuckles] No, but all workshops begin with a warm-up,
translation.fr: Non, mais tout atelier commence par une séance d'échauffement,

translation.en: and that's to wake up our voices and our bodies, so we're ready to perform. [all] Ah!
translation.fr: pour réveiller la voix et le corps afin de pouvoir jouer.

translation.en: Yes, so now, do as I do. Okay?
Now, warm-up stage left
and warm-up stage right.
[all] Warm-up stage left
and warm-up stage right.
Right, now, warm up your muscles to make them less tight.
translation.fr: Maintenant, on s'échauffe les muscles pour qu'ils soient moins tendus.

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -Good.
Reach up to the rafters
translation.fr: On lève les bras vers les cintres

translation.en: and down to the stage.
translation.fr: et on redescend jusqu'à la scène.

translation.en: [all] Reach up to the rafters
translation.fr: On lève les bras vers les cintres

translation.en: and down to the stage.
translation.fr: et on redescend jusqu'à la scène.

translation.en: Good. Warm up your shoulders
and now your rib cage.
Good.
-[clattering] -But what's that noise?
I have no idea, but just keep going.
translation.fr: Je n'en sais rien, mais continuons.

translation.en: -[Spike] Okay. -[Julie] Warm up your lips.
Good. Warm up your heart and warm up your voice.
translation.fr: Bien. On s'échauffe le cœur et on s'échauffe la voix.

translation.en: And we're ready to start.
-Hey, Jools. -Hmm?
[yelps] What are you doing?
[whispers] We got a little situation in the basement.
translation.fr: On a un problème au sous-sol.

translation.en: -What kind of situation? -[all] What?
[whispers] A burst pipe.
-A what? -A burst pipe.
A burst pipe? How bad?
Oh, my.
Ahh! My ruby slippers!
Is it raining in the basement?
Something like that.
I tried to fix it. It's pretty bad. We gotta call the plumber.
translation.fr: C'est la catastrophe, il faut appeler le plombier.

translation.en: -Everything is underwater. -Everything?
Props?
Costumes? Scripts?
Even the Yellow Brick Road?
translation.fr: Même la route de brique jaune ?

translation.en: -Not so yellow anymore. -[Hank gasps]
-[all] Oh! -[Riley] That's unfortunate.
Call the plumber.
Oh. This is terrible.
It's taken years to build up our stock.
translation.fr: Il a fallu des années pour rassembler tout ça.

translation.en: Everything we need for The Wizard of Oz is ruined.
translation.fr: Tout ce dont on a besoin pour Le Magicien d'Oz est fichu.

translation.en: [gasps] No Wizard of Oz?
I'm afraid not, Peri.
-[Peri] Oh, no. -[Riley] Oh, that's a shame.
Well, that was the plumbing company.
They're gonna try to get someone here as soon as possible.
translation.fr: Ils envoient quelqu'un dès que possible.

translation.en: [gasps] And Edna Brightful was coming to see the show.
translation.fr: Et Edna Brightful qui devait venir voir le spectacle.

translation.en: Yikes, I forgot about that.
Who's Edna Brightful?
She's a great patron of the arts, Hank.
She gives money to theater programs like ours to...
translation.fr: Elle donne de l'argent à des ateliers comme le nôtre

translation.en: help us do our work.
[chuckles] Now we'll have nothing to show her.
translation.fr: On n'a plus rien à lui présenter.

translation.en: Let me see what I can salvage.
translation.fr: Voyons ce que je peux sauver.

translation.en: What's gonna happen?
I don't know,
but I've got a sump pump at my house, if that helps.
translation.fr: mais j'ai une pompe de relevage chez moi, si vous voulez.

translation.en: A thump thump?
Well, guess I won't be playing the Cowardly Lion.
translation.fr: Je ne jouerai pas le Lion peureux.

translation.en: [sighs] And no Tin Man for me.
translation.fr: Et pas d'homme en fer-blanc pour moi.

translation.en: It's okay.
Riley has a thump thump.
It seems everything's falling apart today.
translation.fr: On dirait que tout tombe en ruine, aujourd'hui.

translation.en: -Miss Julie? -Yes, Spike.
[stutters] I made up a rhyme for you.
translation.fr: J'ai inventé une rime pour vous.

translation.en: Uh, when everything you care about goes down the drain,
translation.fr: Pensez, si par malheur vous avez le bourdon,

translation.en: just remember, 'round the corner is a candy cane.
translation.fr: qu'une visite chez le docteur s'achève par un bonbon.

translation.en: That's lovely, Spike. [inhales deeply]
-Yeah, it makes me feel much better. -Oh, good.
translation.fr: - Oui, je me sens beaucoup mieux. - Super.

translation.en: -Miss Julie, are we getting candy canes? -[Julie chuckles]
translation.fr: Miss Julie, on va avoir des bonbons ?

translation.en: -Not quite, Fizz, no. -[Fizz] Oh.
Spike is just reminding me that things can always get better.
translation.fr: Spike me rappelle juste que tout finit par s'arranger.

translation.en: You know we have a saying in the theater?
translation.fr: Vous savez, on a un dicton dans le monde du théâtre qui dit :

translation.en: "The show must go on."
So maybe we'll just have to do a different show,
translation.fr: On n'a qu'à faire un autre spectacle,

translation.en: one that doesn't need a lot of scenery or costumes.
translation.fr: avec moins de décors et de costumes.

translation.en: -A different show? -Well, what'll it be about?
Well, I'm not sure yet.
But you know, I've always wanted to do an original musical.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai toujours voulu faire ma propre comédie musicale.

translation.en: Huh. Maybe this is the moment.
Okay, so I managed to find a few things that weren't ruined.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé quelques affaires qui peuvent encore servir.

translation.en: -Um, a flower basket. -Yeah.
A trombone, uh, a frying pan, a shield...
translation.fr: Un trombone, une poêle, un bouclier...

translation.en: Um, this crown. And this.
Good heavens! [laughs]
That's not one of our props.
He says he came out of the burst pipe, and his name is Hugo.
translation.fr: Il est arrivé par le tuyau qui fuit, il s'appelle Hugo.

translation.en: I studied Duck at Wesleyan.
translation.fr: J'ai étudié le canard à l'université.

translation.en: Well, um... [clears throat] how do you do?
What's he saying now?
Well, he says he'd like to be part of the show.
[Peri] A duck in our show? I'm confused.
translation.fr: Un canard dans notre spectacle ? Comment ça ?

translation.en: Can ducks act?
-[scoffs] -I mean, he's a duck. What would he do?
-[all clamoring] -[stutters] No, no, no. Wait. Wait.
The theater never discriminates, so we'll have to consider this.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de discrimination au théâtre, nous devons l'envisager.

translation.en: Well, he says he'd like to audition.
translation.fr: Il dit qu'il veut passer une audition.

translation.en: Does anyone know Ponchielli's La Danza Delle Ore?
translation.fr: Quelqu'un connaît La Danza Delle Ore de Ponchielli ?

translation.en: Not by heart.
He also says he can be helpful backstage. Props...
translation.fr: Il peut aussi aider en coulisse. Pour les accessoires...

translation.en: -Sound effects. -[quacks]
-Swabbing the deck. -[quacks]
-And he's a natural for the aerial ballet. -[quacks]
translation.fr: Et il se débrouille comme un chef en ballet aérien.

translation.en: Oh, well... [laughs]
I guess that settles it, then.
He's in.
-[Spike] Yeah! -Bravo!
-I've never seen a duck do that better! -[Julie] Oh!
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais vu un canard aussi doué !

translation.en: -Idina! Hello! -[chuckling]
-Thank you for having me here. -Welcome. I'm so pleased you're here.
translation.fr: - Merci de m'avoir invitée. - Je suis ravie de te voir.

translation.en: -Remember Gus? -There she is.
-Welcome back, superstar! -Hi!
-[laughs] I still remember. -So nice to see you.
translation.fr: - Content de te voir. - Je me rappelle.

translation.en: Greenies, please say hello to our guest today...
translation.fr: Petits artistes, dites bonjour à notre invitée du jour...

translation.en: Idina... Idina Menzel?
-[laughs] Yes, it's so nice to meet you. -[sighs]
Each time we meet,
a special guest will lead us in a master class
translation.fr: un invité spécial nous donnera un cours

translation.en: in one of the performing arts.
translation.fr: dans un des arts du spectacle.

translation.en: And today, Idina will be introducing us to theater arts.
translation.fr: Aujourd'hui, Idina va nous parler du théâtre.

translation.en: -I love theater arts, Idina Menzel. -[chuckles]
Idina started out as one of our Greenies here,
translation.fr: Idina a fait ses armes ici, en tant que petite artiste,

translation.en: just like you all and Gus.
Yeah, when I studied the theater arts with Miss Julie,
translation.fr: Étudier le théâtre avec Miss Julie

translation.en: it was a life-changing experience for me.
I love performing, Idina Menzel.
translation.fr: J'adore faire du théâtre, Idina Menzel.

translation.en: -This is Peri. -Ah.
-Yeah, I'm Peri. Please say my name. -Hi, Peri.
translation.fr: - C'est moi. Dites mon nom. - Salut, Peri.

translation.en: -Oh, you said my name! -[laughs]
-And this is Spike and Riley and Fizz... -[Fizz] Hi.
-...and Hank and Hugo. -[Hank] Hi.
Jools, the plumber is here and would like a word with you.
translation.fr: Jools, le plombier est là, il veut vous parler.

translation.en: -[sighs] Thank goodness. -Plumber?
Oh, burst pipe.
Gus, can you take over here?
translation.fr: Gus, tu peux continuer la leçon ?

translation.en: -Will do. -Oh, good.
-Oh, uh, you're gonna need these. -What?
translation.fr: - Vous aurez besoin de ça. - Quoi ?

translation.en: -Here. -Oh, okay.
[sighs] Gosh.
-[chuckles] -Thank you, love. I'll see you in a minute, then.
-[Hank] Okay, bye. -[all] Bye, Miss Julie.
Okay, Greenies. Uh, Peri may know our guest.
translation.fr: Bien, les petits artistes. Peri a l'air de connaître notre invitée.

translation.en: I do. [chuckles]
But the rest of you may not, so I'm gonna show you guys a little glimpse
translation.fr: Mais les autres, non. Je vais donc vous montrer un aperçu

translation.en: of what Idina's been up to since she left the Greenroom.
translation.fr: de ce qu'a fait Idina après l'atelier.

translation.en: -[Peri gasps] -[Hank] Ah, cool.
I hope you're not gonna show that moment when I tripped over my broomstick.
translation.fr: Ne montre pas la fois où j'ai trébuché sur mon balai.

translation.en: -[Peri] I wanna see it. -[cackles]
Oh, my gosh, did you hear that cackle? I have a witch's cackle.
translation.fr: Oh mon Dieu, écoutez ce rire ! J'ai un rire de sorcière.

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -[cackling] Ah, I can't stop.
-All right, guys. Check this out. -Okay.
[Julie] As a little girl, Idina Menzel loved to sing so much,
translation.fr: Quand elle était petite, Idina Menzel aimait tellement chanter

translation.en: that she started singing lessons when she was only eight years old.
translation.fr: qu'elle a commencé à prendre des cours de chant dès huit ans.

translation.en: Now she's a famous singer and actress.
translation.fr: Elle est devenue une actrice et chanteuse renommée.

translation.en: She's the voice of Elsa in the movie Frozen.
translation.fr: Elle fait la voix d'Elsa dans le film La Reine des Neiges.

translation.en: She's also starred in lots of Broadway shows,
translation.fr: Elle a aussi joué dans des comédies musicales à Broadway,

translation.en: including the role of Elphaba, the Wicked Witch of the West,
translation.fr: notamment le rôle d'Elphaba, la méchante sorcière de l'Ouest,

translation.en: in the musical, Wicked.
Recently, Idina helped start a theater camp called A BroaderWay,
translation.fr: Récemment, Idina a aidé à créer le camp de théâtre A BroaderWay,

translation.en: that gives young girls opportunities to learn from Broadway actors.
translation.fr: qui permet à de jeunes filles d'apprendre au contact d'acteurs de Broadway.

translation.en: Aren't we lucky that Idina is here today to share her love of musical theater?
translation.fr: Quelle chance qu'Idina nous fasse partager son amour des comédies musicales !

translation.en: [Peri exclaims] Oh, Idina!
I can't believe you started here, just like us.
translation.fr: C'est incroyable que vous ayez commencé ici, comme nous.

translation.en: [chuckles] I did, and I did so many shows with Miss Julie.
translation.fr: Eh oui. Et j'ai fait plein de spectacles avec Miss Julie.

translation.en: What are you guys thinking of doing?
Well, we were gonna do The Wizard of Oz...
translation.fr: On devait jouer Le Magicien d'Oz...

translation.en: -But our Yellow Brick Road turned beige. -[all] Yeah.
translation.fr: Mais notre route de brique jaune a viré au beige.

translation.en: -Oh, no. That's awful. -[Peri] I know.
translation.fr: - Oh, non. C'est affreux. - Je sais.

translation.en: I was going to play Dorothy.
Actually, Peri, the Witch is by far the better part.
translation.fr: À vrai dire, le rôle de la sorcière est plus intéressant.

translation.en: So, any other ideas?
-Oh, we don't have a clue. -[both sigh]
-Uh... -I don't know.
[gasps] I know. Something with music.
translation.fr: Je sais. Un truc avec de la musique.

translation.en: [sing-song] Some, uh, rock 'n roll?
Or how about a ballet?
-I'd love to wear a tutu. -[Idina chuckles]
-How about a candy cane parade? -[quacks inquisitively]
translation.fr: Pourquoi pas un défilé de bonbons ?

translation.en: Those are all excellent ideas.
translation.fr: Ce sont toutes de bonnes idées.

translation.en: And I do love candy canes, Fizz.
-[Fizz] Oh... -Anyone else?
Don't look at me. I signed up for robotics.
translation.fr: Ne me regardez pas. Je m'étais inscrite au cours de robotique.

translation.en: He's suggesting The Little Mermaid.
I feel like we should stay away from anything with water.
translation.fr: Je préférerais éviter tout ce qui touche à l'eau.

translation.en: But I do love musicals.
So do I.
Miss Julie said she wanted to do an orangi ball musical.
translation.fr: Miss Julie a dit qu'elle voulait faire une comédie musicale propre.

translation.en: Oh, she means original musical.
translation.fr: Elle veut dire "sa propre comédie musicale".

translation.en: That's it.
Miss Julie always wanted to do an original musical for years.
translation.fr: Miss Julie a toujours voulu en faire une.

translation.en: But how do we do that?
Yeah, I've never even seen a musical before.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais vu de comédie musicale.

translation.en: Maybe what you should do is go see a great musical in action.
translation.fr: Vous devriez aller voir une bonne comédie musicale en vrai.

translation.en: That will help give you some ideas for yours.
-[Gus] Yes. Yeah. -[Hank] Yeah. But, but... well, how?
-Field trip. -[all gasp]
I'll make a few calls. I'll stay here and help Julie.
translation.fr: Je passe quelques coups de fil. Je reste aider Julie.

translation.en: Fire up the bus, Gus.
These kids are going to Broadway.
We're going to Broadway.
-That's so cool! Wow! -[all exclaiming]
Guys, let's go. Come on.
Have fun! Bye.
[Peri] I can't believe we're here.
translation.fr: Je n'en reviens pas d'être ici.

translation.en: -[gasps] You're Rachel Tucker. -I am. You're Rachel Tucker.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes Rachel Tucker. - C'est moi.

translation.en: You play Elphaba now in Wicked on Broadway.
translation.fr: Vous jouez le rôle d'Elphaba dans Wicked à Broadway.

translation.en: -I do. [chuckles] -[all gasp and chuckle]
It is so brilliant to meet you guys. Welcome to the Gershwin Theatre.
translation.fr: Ravie de faire votre connaissance. Bienvenue au Gershwin Theatre.

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Rachel Tucker.
Idina called, so I've been expecting you lot.
translation.fr: Idina m'a prévenue que vous veniez.

translation.en: And I believe you would love a backstage tour.
translation.fr: Je parie qu'une visite des coulisses vous plairait.

translation.en: -[Peri] Yes, we would! -[all exclaim]
-Let's do it. -[all cheering]
So, Riley, this is the Wizard's head.
-Amazing. -Right?
-How does it work? -Well, we have crew guys behind it.
translation.fr: - Comment ça marche ? - Des techniciens sont derrière.

translation.en: The jaw moves and even the eyes light up.
translation.fr: La mâchoire bouge et les yeux s'allument.

translation.en: -Are you kidding? -It's incredible.
-That's amazing. -[chuckles] Right?
-[chuckles] Hey, Hugo. Don't worry. -[quacks]
It's just a mask. The mask that we use in the show.
translation.fr: Ce sont les masques qu'on utilise pour le spectacle.

translation.en: So this is the orchestra pit.
Wow! The orchestra plays down there?
Uh-huh. All 24 musicians.
-Oh, my gosh! -Right?
-That's incredible. -Mmm-hmm.
Oh, someday I wanna play down there.
translation.fr: Un jour, je veux y jouer.

translation.en: Wow! Is this your dressing room?
Yes, this is where I get ready every evening for the show. -Whoa! And... -Yeah.
translation.fr: Oui, c'est ici que je me prépare pour le spectacle, tous les soirs.

translation.en: [gasps] Is this where you get green?
translation.fr: Et... C'est ici que vous devenez verte ?

translation.en: -It is! Yes. -[chuckles]
Look, I have a photograph of how I look when I'm completely greenified.
translation.fr: Regarde, une photo de moi complètement verdie.

translation.en: [Fizz] Wow. Spooky. -[both giggling] -[Rachel] It is a bit.
translation.fr: - Ça fait peur. - Un peu, oui.

translation.en: Can you show me how you get green?
Oh, yes, I can. Look, just look this way.
-It's green paint that gets put on. -Oh... [gasps]
translation.fr: C'est du maquillage vert qu'on me met.

translation.en: It's very nice and smooth. It's a bit cold.
translation.fr: C'est très doux, un peu froid.

translation.en: -[Fizz] Wow! -Do you like that?
Yeah, I like that.
How about I do some on you?
[gasps] Yes, please. Yes, please.
-Yeah? Okay, give me your hand. -[chuckles]
-Oh, my goodness. [whoops] -[laughs]
Awesome.
-Look at all of the Emerald City... -Beautiful, right?
translation.fr: - Regardez les costumes d'Émeraude... - C'est beau, non ?

translation.en: -Oh, I love all of them so much. -Yeah.
What... what's this? Is this what I think it is?
-It is. [chuckles] -They are? They're not...
translation.fr: - Oui. - Ah oui ? Mais elles ne sont pas...

translation.en: This is my Wicked Witch dress that I wear in the second half.
translation.fr: C'est ma robe de sorcière pour la seconde partie.

translation.en: Oh. And that's Glinda's dress?
translation.fr: Et c'est la robe de Glinda ?

translation.en: -And that's Glinda's dress. -Oh!
Oh, I love this so much.
[Peri exclaims] Look at that.
-♪ Dancing through life ♪ -Hey, guys.
-[all chattering excitedly] -Oh, they're back.
[Hank] That was so cool.
Welcome back, Greenies.
So, how was the show?
-It was awesome! -[overlapping chatter]
Really? Oh, thank you, Idina.
You know, the gift you've just given us, amazing.
Aw, it's my pleasure.
How did it go with the plumber?
Oh, well, he... he did what he could for today.
translation.fr: Il a fait ce qu'il pouvait.

translation.en: But come on, I want to hear all about it. Tell me.
translation.fr: Mais je veux tout savoir. Racontez-moi.

translation.en: Oh, it was such a cool story.
And the music was awesome.
And the singing and dancing were so... [sing-song] fabulous.
translation.fr: Et les chansons et les danses étaient fabuleuses.

translation.en: And there was all this amazing technical stuff,
translation.fr: Et il y avait plein de super trucs techniques :

translation.en: like... like lighting and hydraulics.
And lots and lots of actors,
who dressed up and who bowed at the end, like this.
translation.fr: qui portaient des costumes et saluaient à la fin, comme ça.

translation.en: -Well, there. -[Hugo snoring]
Sounds like you had a very big day, right?
translation.fr: On dirait que vous avez eu une longue journée.

translation.en: But what should our show be like?
translation.fr: Mais à quoi ressemblera notre spectacle ?

translation.en: It won't be like a Broadway show.
translation.fr: Pas à un spectacle de Broadway.

translation.en: 'Cause it wouldn't have hydraulics.
translation.fr: On n'a pas de mécanismes hydrauliques.

translation.en: Yeah. We don't have all those fancy costumes.
Yeah. This is gonna be hard.
You don't need all of that stuff.
No. If we put our minds together and, uh...
translation.fr: Non. Si on réfléchit ensemble et...

translation.en: What do you think?
Absolutely.
Let me tell you a little secret.
translation.fr: Je vais vous confier un secret.

translation.en: -[Peri] What is it, Idina Menzel? -[Hank] Yeah?
♪ When you're confused Feeling down on your own ♪
translation.fr: Si tu te sens perdu Seul et déprimé

translation.en: ♪ When your fire won't light the way ♪
translation.fr: Si tu ne sais plus où aller

translation.en: ♪ That's when you have to go In search of the unknown ♪
translation.fr: Il faut partir à la rencontre de l’inconnu

translation.en: ♪ The promise of a brand new day ♪
translation.fr: De la promesse d’une nouvelle journée

translation.en: ♪ If you don't see it Then change your view ♪
translation.fr: Si tu ne la vois pas, regarde ailleurs

translation.en: ♪ If you don't wish it It can't come true ♪
translation.fr: Si tu n’en rêves pas Ce n’est peut-être pas l’heure

translation.en: ♪ You must open your heart ♪
♪ Let go of your doubt ♪
♪ It won't rain forever The sun will come out ♪
translation.fr: La pluie bientôt cessera Le soleil viendra

translation.en: ♪ You don't need to know the answers now ♪
translation.fr: Non, ces réponses, tu ne les as pas

translation.en: -♪ Just believe in yourself ♪ -[Peri] Oh, wow.
translation.fr: Mais il faut croire en toi

translation.en: ♪ And I know that you'll Get there somehow ♪
translation.fr: Tu verras que tu y arriveras

translation.en: ♪ Yes, believe in yourself ♪
translation.fr: Mais il faut croire en toi

translation.en: ♪ And I know that You'll get there somehow ♪
translation.fr: Tu verras que tu y arriveras

translation.en: [Peri] Oh, Idina.
[Hank] Thank you. That really...
-[all exclaim] -[Julie] Oh, Idina.
I couldn't have put it better.
You see, Greenies, we will get there somehow.
translation.fr: Vous voyez, les petits artistes, on y arrivera.

translation.en: Let's change our view.
[gasps] I see a crown!
[gasps] Hey, a trombone.
Oh. Sorry, Hugo.
-What did he say? -Don't ask.
translation.fr: - Qu'a-t-il dit ? - Je ne le répéterai pas.

translation.en: Couldn't we use all these things in our new show?
translation.fr: On ne pourrait pas utiliser tout ça dans notre spectacle ?

translation.en: Yeah. And maybe Gus and I could make some new things to go with them.
translation.fr: Oui. Et Gus et moi pouvons en fabriquer d'autres.

translation.en: That reminds me...
I've got something for you, Riley. [sighs]
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose pour toi, Riley.

translation.en: -[Riley] Oh? -Your very own tool belt.
My own precision calipers. Thank you.
translation.fr: Un pied à coulisse rien qu'à moi. Merci.

translation.en: [stammering] Wait. A trombone, a crown.
translation.fr: Un instant. Un trombone, une couronne.

translation.en: Those things don't go together.
They're from different shows.
Hmm. [gasps] Wait.
-What? [gasps] -Lightbulb!
Why don't we put all the things together in one show?
translation.fr: Si on rassemblait tout ça dans un même spectacle ?

translation.en: You mean a bunch of different things mashed-up together?
translation.fr: Comme une compilation de plein de choses différentes ?

translation.en: Yeah. Mash-Up: The Musical.
I think you may be on to something.
translation.fr: Je pense que tu tiens quelque chose.

translation.en: I like it, Jools.
Way to go, Greenies.
-[all] Yeah! -[Hank] We did it.
You see that? You got there. You found your idea.
translation.fr: Vous voyez ? Vous y êtes arrivés. Vous avez trouvé une idée.

translation.en: [Julie] Thank you, dear Idina.
Oh, my gosh, you've set us back on track. [exclaims]
translation.fr: Tu nous as remis sur les rails.

translation.en: I'm so glad. I can't wait to see the final result.
translation.fr: Tu m'en vois ravie. J'ai hâte de voir le résultat.

translation.en: Mash-Up: The Musical.
-[all chuckle] -[Spike] I like it.
So... what's the story gonna be about?
translation.fr: Alors... de quoi ça va parler ?

translation.en: Let's worry about that next time. It's time for you to get home.
translation.fr: On verra ça la prochaine fois. C'est l'heure de rentrer.

translation.en: But there's still so much to do.
translation.fr: Mais il y a tant à faire.

translation.en: I think we're in great shape. I mean, we've got our idea,
translation.fr: Je trouve qu'on avance bien. On a notre idée,

translation.en: and all we need now is to, um...
translation.fr: il ne nous reste plus qu'à...

translation.en: compose the music and... design the scenery,
translation.fr: composer la musique, construire les décors,

translation.en: -build the props and... -[Idina] Mmm. ...come up with a little thing called a story.
translation.fr: fabriquer les accessoires et... juste une bricole : inventer une histoire.

translation.en: -[Idina chuckles] -Ha! Piece of cake.
translation.fr: fabriquer les accessoires et... juste une bricole : inventer une histoire. Fastoche.

translation.en: -[Peri] Piece of cake. -[Hank] Okay!
-[Peri] See you, Miss Julie. -[Hank] Bye, Miss Julie.
translation.fr: Oui. Fastoche. Au revoir, Miss Julie.

translation.en: -[Fizz] Bye, Miss Julie. Bye, Idina. -Thank you again.
Thank you.
Bye, my dears. Good-bye, everybody.
Uh, Miss Julie, Miss Julie.
-Uh, yes, Fizz? -Um... when I grow up...
translation.fr: - Oui, Fizz ? - Quand je serai grande,

translation.en: I want to have my own theater, just like you.
translation.fr: je veux avoir mon propre théâtre, tout comme vous.
